snippet: State officials on Tuesday reported the largest monthly decline in water use this year.
abstract: California officials report the largest monthly decline in water use in 2014, with consumption falling 11.5 percent in August compared with the year before.
lead_paragraph: State officials on Tuesday reported the largest monthly decline in water use this year.

headline.main: California: Water Use Falls in Wake of Restrictions
headline.print_headline: California: Water Use Falls in Wake of Restrictions
